org.needle4j.mock

Interface SpyProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockitoProvider

    public interface SpyProvider
    Interface to abstract the creation of spy() instances, if the used framework allows to do so.
    Author:
    Jan Galinski, Holisticon AG

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SpyProvider FAKE
      Just return the given instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T createSpyComponent(T instance) 
      Class<? extends Annotation> getSpyAnnotation() 
      boolean isSpyRequested(Field field) 

    • Field Detail

      • FAKE

        static final SpyProvider FAKE
        Just return the given instance. Use this as default provider when the mockProvider does not support spies.

    • Method Detail

      • createSpyComponent

        <T> T createSpyComponent(T instance)
        Parameters:
        instance -
        Returns:
        Spy of instance (spy(instance) for Mockito)

      • getSpyAnnotation

        Class<? extends Annotation> getSpyAnnotation()
        Returns:
        the Annotation used to trigger the spy creation. (@Spy for Mockito)

      • isSpyRequested

        boolean isSpyRequested(Field field)
